mapper.insert: insert into user(username, password, realname, sex, phone, position, type, available, salt) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{realname}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{position}, #{type}, #{available}, #{salt})
mapper.update: update user set username=#{username}, realname=#{realname}, sex=#{sex}, phone={#phone}, position=#{position}, type=#{type}, available=#{available} where id=#{id}
update user set password=#{password}, salt=#{salt} where id=#{id}
